segments.text: I admire the serenity outside the window, a stark contrast to the chaos within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is gushing from the sink, a steady stream that seems to mirror my rising anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying that plate looks so serene, blissfully unaware of the growing mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children! They’re so intent on their cookies, it’s almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I feel that pang of frustration; do they have to be so reckless?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s stool looks like it’s about to tip at any moment, and I’m holding my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to rush in and save them from themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
